channel.title: 川皇：HK暴动已持续多时，HK问题是中国内政，好自为之
channel.description: 川皇：HK暴动已持续多时，HK问题是中国内政，好自为之

item.title: 川皇：HK暴动已持续多时，HK问题是中国内政，好自为之[50-100]
item.description:
川皇：HK暴动已持续多时，HK问题是中国内政，好自为之 本帖最后由 koswinner 于 2019-8-2 21:15 编辑
US President Donald Trump labelled recent protests in Hong Kong as “riots,” adopting the same language used by Chinese authorities and suggesting the US would stay out of an issue that was “between Hong Kong and China.”“Something is probably happening with Hong Kong, because when you look at, you know, what’s going on, they’ve had riots for a long period of time,” Trump told reporters at the White House on Thursday before departing for a campaign rally in Cincinnati.He said he doesn’t know what China’s attitude is on the matter. “Somebody said that at some point they’re going to want to stop that,” Trump said. “But that’s between Hong Kong and that’s between China, because Hong Kong is a part of China,they should deal with it themselves, I don't have advise for them."直接糊脸港灿主要诉求之一 “no riots, only tyranny", 不知道挥舞美国国旗的港灿们作何感想
item.content:encoded:
1g2l3p4p:
塔那 发表于 2019-8-2 21:24
华春莹喷美帝幕后黑手喷了好几天了，你这么一说，岂不是全都打了偏靶？
—— 来自 Xiaomi MIX 2, ...
不，民进党也是CIA训练出来的。

华春莹喷美帝幕后黑手喷了好几天了，你这么一说，岂不是全都打了偏靶？
—— 来自 Xiaomi MIX 2, ...

Eva:
跟希拉里那种人路数不一样

能饮一杯无:
美国总统唐纳德特朗普将最近在香港举行的抗议活动称为“骚乱”，采用中国当局使用的相同语言，并暗示美国将不会出现“香港与中国之间”的问题。
“香港可能会发生一些事情，因为当你看到，你知道，发生了什么，他们已经发生了很长一段时间的骚乱，”特朗普周四在白宫告诉记者，然后前往竞选集会 在辛辛那提。
他说他不知道中国对此事的态度。 特朗普说：“有人说，在某些时候他们会想要阻止这种情况。”“但这是香港和中国之间的事情，因为香港是中国的一部分，他们应该自己处理，我没有为他们提供建议。”
以上由谷歌翻译提供
—— 来自 samsung SM-G9730, Android 9上的 S1Next-鹅版 v2.1.2

b2c:
所以越来越凸显解决台湾问题的必要性和紧迫性，不解决台湾这块病灶会向全身其他地方扩散！

不知多少叛变战团回归

ebuw:
正如贸易战并不是神皇一个人的决定一样。神皇对香港的看法，也不是美国国会对香港的看法。说港独资金来源都是台湾，那是从结果推论原因。显然美国国会也是资金来源啊。

这次很正啊

US President Donald Trump labelled recent protests in Hong Kong as “riots,” adopting the same language used by Chinese authorities and suggesting the US would stay out of an issue that was “between Hong Kong and China.”“Something is probably happening with Hong Kong, because when you look at, you know, what’s going on, they’ve had riots for a long period of time,” Trump told reporters at the White House on Thursday before departing for a campaign rally in Cincinnati.He said he doesn’t know what China’s attitude is on the matter. “Somebody said that at some point they’re going to want to stop that,” Trump said. “But that’s between Hong Kong and that’s between China, because Hong Kong is a part of China,they should deal with it themselves, I don't have advise for them."直接糊脸港灿主要诉求之一 “no riots, only tyranny", 不知道挥舞美国国旗的港灿们作何感想
